_sText:
Extraxt all files to the Counter-Strike Source/cstrike/maps folder.

================================================================================
* LEVEL INFORMATION *
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
TITLE                   : cs_logistic_assault_hdr
FILENAME                : cs_logistic_assault_hdr.bsp
AUTHOR                  : Bluestrike McQueen
DATE                    : 26 februari 2007 
GAME                    : half-Life 2 COunter-Strike Source.
EMAIL ADDRESS           : Bluestrike@bluestrike.be
HOMEPAGE URL            : http://www.bluestrike.be
 
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
* LEVEL DESCRIPTION *
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Another remake of cs_assault but I took a wider approach.
Setting is a european industrial area, Terrorists drove into a industial
building when followed by the police and took hostages,
A Counter Terrorism team is send to handle the situation.
 
NEW TEXTURES            : Advertising texture and trailer skin.
NEW MODELS		: Trailer model.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
* CONSTRUCTION *
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
MAP BASE                : Size reference of cs_assault
MAP VERSION		: build 54 
PREFABS USED            : none
EDITOR(S) USED          : Hammer 4,0, Softimage XSI and Paint Shop Pro 7
OTHER UTILITIES USED    : none 
KNOWN BUGS              : none.
 
COMPILE MACHINE         : Core2duo Qx6700 2gb DDR2
 
compile time		: 45 minutes for a -final compile.
time spend on building 	: 1.0 3-4 weeks after work
			  1.1 Update after 1.5 year after release.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
* OTHER LEVELS BY THE AUTHOR *
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Too many to name but here is a pick:

Singleplay:

  Awakening (Half-Life 2) http://awakening.hl2files.com/
  Nickrock (Farcry)

Multiplay:

  cs_beirut (Counter-strike)
  de_kilo (Counter-strike)
  
  de_kilo2 (Counter-strike source)
  de_battleship (Counter-strike source)
  cs_beirut2 (Counter-strike source)

  ins_karkar (insurgency HL2 mod)
  ins_escort (insurgency HL2 mod)

  ctf_portalstorm (ctf HL2 mod)

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
* SPECIAL INSTRUCTIONS / ADDITIONAL INFORMATION *
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Fixes RC2 -> v1.0:
- Improved fps indoor.
- Added more 3d skybox detail.
- Added 2nd ladder to vents for terrorists.
- Wider doors to hostages.
- Improved nav file for bots by CoCoNut. 

Fixes 1.1.
- Added hdr support.
- Added 'green' radar image.
- Added custom trailer model.

 
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
* CREDITS *
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Cryptr for the orriginal map cs_assault
Spine for the trailer skin. (http://www.spineroyal.com)
CocoNuT for the improved NAV file. (http://coconut.de.tc)
Valve for their awesome game and support
Thanks to all the tutorial makers out there.
Thanks to the people who gave valuable feedback.


================================================================================
* COPYRIGHT / PERMISSIONS *
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
You MUST NOT distribute this level UNLESS you INCLUDE THIS FILE WITH
NO MODIFICATIONS!!!. If you don't co-operate, then DON'T DISTRIBUTE
IT IN ANY FORM!!.

You can do everything you like as long as this unchanged text file will be included!
of course letting me know will be appreciated. 

Bluestrike, Belgium.
